name: CreateInsightsSharingPassword
description:
Create a new password for insights sharing configuration.

This tool is used to create a new password for the sharing configuration of a specific insight within a project. Call this tool when you need to generate a password for sharing insights securely.

parameters.name: insight_identifier
parameters.description: The numerical ID representing the specific insight to create a password for.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The ID of the project you want to access. Obtain it by calling /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

parameters.name: insights_sharing_password_details
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details like the creation date, whether the password is enabled, the access token, settings configurations, and if a password is required.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.

value_schema.description: Project ID of the project you're trying to access. To find the ID of the project, make a call to /api/projects/.
